Package btindices

Class HDTUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • btindices.HDTUtil
  • public class HDTUtil
extends Object
    Represents a class with useful methods and variables in order to manage, query and explore an HDT file.
    Author:
    Maximilian Wenzel

    • Constructor Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static String addQuotesIfNecessary​(String s)
      Adds quotes to the string if it is a literal (because apache command line removes all quotes...)
      static org.eclipse.collections.impl.set.mutable.UnifiedSet<Long> convertStringHSIntoIDHS​(org.eclipse.collections.impl.set.mutable.UnifiedSet<String> hashSetStr, org.rdfhdt.hdt.dictionary.Dictionary dic, org.rdfhdt.hdt.enums.TripleComponentRole dictionaryIDRole)
      Converts a string hash set into a ID hash set in correlation to the corresponding ID role in the dictionary.

      Converts a given TripleString into a TripleID object.

      Returns a TripleID object for a TripleString, predicate and object in regarding their IDs in the passed dictionary.

      Generates a hash set with all IDs of the specified triple component role (i.e. save all subjects, predicates or objects).

      Generates a hash set with all strings of the specified triple component role (i.e. save all subjects, predicates or objects).

      Obtains all RDF classes from a given HDT file and returns them in an array as URIs.

      Returns a SPARQL query where all resources at the subject position are from RDF class 1 and all resources at object position are from RDF class 2.

      • printURIFragmentsForTripleID

        public static void printURIFragmentsForTripleID​(org.rdfhdt.hdt.dictionary.Dictionary dic,
                                                org.rdfhdt.hdt.triples.TripleID tID)
        Converts a TripleID object to its string representation and prints only the URI fragments to the standard output. In case of literals, the whole resource is printed.
